NATIONAL REACH. LOCAL EXPERTISE
-------------------------------

* * *

Taking collaboration in commercial real estate to a whole new level.

[View Properties](https://svnoakrealty.com/offerings/)

### FOCUSED ON CULTURE. BUILT ON BELIEFS.

Learn more about the core values that shape our unique culture and guide verything that we do.

[Why SVN?](https://svnoakrealty.com/svn-property-management/)
[Core Covenants](https://svnoakrealty.com/core-covenants/)

### SVN BY THE NUMBERS

![5 billion](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/themes/SASS_Bootstrap_starter_theme/assets/images/5-billion-edited.png)

5.3

![200 cities](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/themes/SASS_Bootstrap_starter_theme/assets/images/244-cities-edited.png)

244

![42 states](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/themes/SASS_Bootstrap_starter_theme/assets/images/42-states-edited.png)

42

### DISCOVER THE SVN DIFFERENCE.

* * *

Our local expertise and expansive network of national buyers translate to greater market visibility and increased demand, resulting in higher values for our clients.

![Multi Family](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Multi-Family.png)

### Multifamily

We have the capability to advise you on your multifamily needs, from local apartments to multistate portfolios.

![Office](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/office.png)

### Office

Our Advisors will help you buy, lease, or sell everything from a Class C office building to a CBD trophy high-rise.

![Industrial](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Industrial.png)

### Industrial

Understanding the factors that impact industrial investment, we offer national reach and local expertise.

![Commercial](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/commercial.png)

### Commercial

Whether you’re buying, selling, or leasing we stand ready to serve your needs on a national and local level.

![Self Storage](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/self-storage.png)

### Self Storage

Self-storage is a desired investment commodity; we stand ready to advise you on this type of venture.

![Medical](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/medical.png)

### Medical

From new construction to master leases, we have the expertise on how to buy, sell, and lease medical office properties.

![Distressed Assets](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/assets.png)

### Distressed Assets

Solutions for distressed assets and portfolios across the United States.

![Single Tennant](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Single-Tennant.png)

### Single Tenant

Our Advisors have proven methods to help you quickly buy, sell, or lease a quality single tenant property.

[See all of our services](https://svnoakrealty.com/our-services/)

### Commercial Real Estate Receivership

Receivership services, combined with strategic property management, include preserving asset value by maximizing cash flow, ensuring proper property maintenance, and improving tenant relations.

[Read More](https://svnoakrealty.com/our-services/#heading40)

data.markdown:
The Sperry Van Ness® Core Covenants
-----------------------------------

The Sperry Van Ness core covenants-emphasizing accountability, responsibility, and transparency-create a positive working environment for our team. Sperry Van Ness Advisors agree to abide by these core covenants, while upholding the Sperry Van Ness brand.

*   Cooperating proactively with all brokers and agents and always placing my client’s interests above my own.
*   Showing respect and support to my clients and colleagues.
*   Honoring my commitments.
*   Personifying and upholding the Sperry Van Ness brand.
*   Creating tangible benefits for my clients, colleagues, and community.
*   Resolving conflicts quickly, positively, and effectively.
*   Taking personal responsibility for achieving my own potential.
*   Excelling in my market area and specialty within the firm.
*   Focusing on the positive and the possible.
*   Nurturing my career while valuing the importance of family, health, and community.

metadata.title: The Sperry Van Ness® Core Covenants - SVN Oak Realty Advisors

data.markdown:
Our Services
------------

We provide commercial real estate knowledge and expertise that transcends typical brokerage services. We’re in the business of listening, understanding, and adding value. Below please find our list of advisory services covering various asset classes and specialties. Our goal is to listen, collaborate and serve your commercial real estate needs with Character, Competency and Certainty.

Multi-Family Properties
-----------------------

Our national Multi-Family Team offer both national reach and local expertise. When you’re looking to buy or sell a single property or a geographically diversified portfolio, Sperry Van Ness Advisors have the capability and capacity to advise you on all of your multi-family needs. Our team routinely works on properties ranging in scope and scale from a small apartment property in a tertiary market to large institutional caliber multi-state portfolios. We don’t discriminate based upon size (large or small) as we value long-term client relationships which requires working at all ends of the multi-family property spectrum.

[Contact Us](https://svnoakrealty.com/contact/)

Office Property Sales
---------------------

When you’re looking to buy or sell a Class C office building in a tertiary market, a suburban Class A building, or a CBD trophy high-rise, the Sperry Van Ness Office Team stands ready to serve your needs. In today’s world of rampant vacancies, we can help evaluate the needs of the asset and client and work in conjunction with our office leasing Advisors to stabilize the asset before or after sale.

[Contact Us](https://svnoakrealty.com/contact/)

Retail Sales
------------

### Retail Properties

Whether you’re looking to buy or sell a local strip center, larger anchored or shadow anchored malls or large regional power centers, the Sperry Van Ness Retail Team stands ready to serve your needs. We have market expertise on all sizes of local retail centers located within our own geographic area of focus and have access to a national network of retail properties all over the country regardless of size.

### Single Tenant Net Leased Investments

Our national team of Single Tenant Net Leased Investment Advisors is extremely active in the STNL investment arena. Our team is here to provide guidance in the sale / acquisition or disposition of your next single tenant property. The experience and reach of the team allows buyers and sellers to locate their ideal properties whether they are local or national. We understand the value placed on the tenant’s credit, lease terms, and location of the property and how they impact the property’s value.

[Contact Us](https://svnoakrealty.com/contact/)

Leasing – Tenant Representation – Owner Representation
------------------------------------------------------

### Retail-Office-Industrial

Sperry Van Ness has worked with developers, owners, banks and investors across the country to help them determine highest and best use in order to maximize both NOI and valuation. Sperry Van Ness Leasing Advisors leverage state of the art technology and business intelligence platforms that go far beyond the tools of typical brokerage firms. Our Sperry Van Ness Leasing Team can assist principals in adding value to their properties to increase velocity of lease-up and maximizing occupancy at market leading percentages.

### Tenant Representation Retail-Office-Industrial

Sperry Van Ness offers Tenant Representations services for local, regional and national tenants. Our capabilities equip tenants with the best market knowledge available. Utilizing our tenant representation services will ensure that landlords compete for your tenancy, thus providing you with the right space at the right price.

[Contact Us](https://svnoakrealty.com/contact/)

Commercial Real Estate Receivership
-----------------------------------

When you need a receiver for a real estate property, you want experience, reliability, and the proven ability to solve often-complex problems. You need to know that the property is secure and is being maintained properly and that your rents are being collected in a timely manner. You need a company that can mobilize quickly and has resources ready to be deployed at a moment’s notice. And, just as important, you want a receiver who knows how to add value.

SVN OAK Realty Advisors, LLC, brings a unique set of competitive advantages to the role of receiver. Our goal in all cases is to preserve asset value by maximizing cash flow, ensuring the property is secure and well maintained and, ultimately, adding value to the property. We stabilize operations and oversee tenant retention, often repairing damaged relationships with tenants. We develop and put in place a strategic plan for managing the property efficiently. We oversee and direct on-site property management teams. We evaluate and develop custom strategies for marketing, including advertising and leasing. And we develop an exit strategy that delivers optimal outcomes for our clients and other stakeholders.

In addition, as our client you have access to a full range of cost-effective asset management services. Our full-time, in-house experts in property management, accounting, leasing, and sales enable us to offer a higher level of service—and save you money.

At SVN OAK Realty Advisors, LLC, you get more than fifty years of knowledge and the experience you want—plus proven success in numerous high-profile and difficult situations. Our clients trust us with everything from apartment buildings to complex cases such as operating businesses—golf courses, banquet halls, etc. When you are searching for receivership companies in Oklahoma, look no further than SVN OAK Realty Advisors, LLC.

Contact Raymond Lord: [rlord@svn.com](mailto:rlord@svn.com)
, [918-201-2005](tel:918-201-2005)
 (office), or [918-850-1779](tel:918-850-1779)
 (cell).

Industrial Property Sales
-------------------------

The national Industrial Team offers both national reach and local expertise across all industrial property types. If you’re looking to buy, sell or lease light industrial or flex space, a large industrial park, or a free standing net-leased industrial building, the Sperry Van Ness Industrial Team stands ready to serve your needs. Sperry Van Ness Advisors provide specific knowledge of the factors that impact industrial investment such as market demographics, site plans, tenant mixes, tenant credit, and traffic patterns, bringing the highest value proposition to their clients.

[Contact Us](https://svnoakrealty.com/contact/)

Land
----

When looking to buy, sell or lease un-entitled raw land for future development, immediately break ground on fully entitled land, receive assistance in site selection, or land bank for speculative purposes, the Sperry Van Ness Land Team stands ready to serve your needs. Sperry Van Ness advisors arm clients with all the information that could affect their investment such as site specifics like location, population shifts, cycles of consumer behavior, development opportunities and new zoning laws to name just a few.

[Contact Us](https://svnoakrealty.com/contact/)

[Back to team page](https://svnoakrealty.com/our-team/)

![](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/RaymondLord_Headshot.jpg)

Raymond Lord
------------

Senior Managing Director

Raymond is a Principal and Managing Director at SVN OAK Realty Advisors. He has 30 years of experience in commercial real estate and is recognized as an industry leader in multifamily transactions. Since 1987 Raymond has had the opportunity to personally work with some of the largest REITS, trusts, and private equity groups in the country and been involved in the sale of multi-family properties in excess of $3.25 billion dollars.

metadata.title: Raymond Lord - SVN Oak Realty Advisors
metadata.ogTitle: Raymond Lord - SVN Oak Realty Advisors
metadata.og:title: Raymond Lord - SVN Oak Realty Advisors

data.markdown:
[Back to team page](https://svnoakrealty.com/our-team/)

![](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Dave-Pinson.png)

Dave Pinson
-----------

Senior Advisor

Prior to joining SVN OAK Realty Advisors full-time, Dave was a principal of Asset Living, a national property management company that operates over 200,000 units. He began his career at Trinity Multifamily as a regional manager and eventually purchased the business from the founders, becoming the CEO and managing partner. Over the next decade, Dave grew Trinity Multifamily from a small company managing just 2,500 units to over 24,000 units. He subsequently sold the business to Asset Living. Having spent his 20-year career managing multifamily and student housing, Dave is a recipient of many industry awards and sits on multiple related boards. He has a bachelor’s degree and master’s degree from Arkansas Tech University.

Max Heidenreich

Sales Associate

Max has been active in Tulsa since 1971 as a builder, developer and real estate associate. His services include real estate consulting, construction management, and plan development. Max also has extensive experience in all facets of tenant representation and commercial real estate.

![](https://svnoakrealty.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/SVN_People_4.jpg)

Susan Davis
-----------

Sales Associate

Susan specializes in the leasing and sales of office and retail properties in Tulsa. Leasing activities have recently included leasing for a local Tulsa office park that consisted of 550,122 square feet. Susan has been active in Tulsa since the early 1990’s as a real estate associate and has extensive experience in Sales, Leasing, and Property Management. Once a Partner in a property management, sales, and leasing brokerage firm that specialized in distressed property, Susan has experience with the RTC, RDIC and private banks. She managed properties in Oklahoma, Arkansas and Texas. Her portfolio consisted of Office, Retail and Multi-family assets. In early 2002 she relocated to San Diego as an Asset and Property Acquisition Specialist and eventually moved to residential sales in the LaJolla area. She was Rookie of the Year and a member of the prestigious International President’s Award for sales volume.

Lonnie Trecek
-------------

Sales Associate

Lonnie Trecek Graduated of Clark School of business with a degree small business. He as been involved in many facets of real estate, including commercial and residential sales, construction and lending since 1970. Lonnie and his family owned and operated a Real Estate office, and owned a Mortgage company and provided FHA and conventional financing along with Commercial financing.

His focus has been on commercial office sales and leasing, as well as commercial financing. He is a member of the national Vietnam veterans of America; he also served on the national and state level of the Oklahoma Mortgage Broker Association and held the office of the vice president and the president for the state of Oklahoma Mortgage Brokers Association.
